text: Jean-Pierre Fourcade (born 18 October 1929) is a French politician. He was a member of the Senate of France. He represented the Hauts-de-Seine and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement Party.Page on the Senate website ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:French Ministers of Finance Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Boulogne-Billancourt Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Lot-et-Garonne
title: Jean-Pierre Fourcade
